article_title: Why Most Cybersecurity Activity Happens Outside the CISO’s Office
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Companies need to expand their understanding of cybersecurity beyond analytics to include broader elements of risk management, technology operations and secure development practices, says McKinsey & Co.’s James Kaplan.
twitter.title: Why Most Cybersecurity Activity Happens Outside the CISO’s Office
